definitions.definition: to join two pieces of cloth together by putting thread through them with a needle:
examples: My grandmother taught me to sew.

definitions.definition: to make a piece of clothing by joining pieces of cloth together by putting thread through them with a needle:
examples: She sews all her children's clothes.

definitions.definition: to use a needle and thread to join up the edges of a cut in the skin or other part of the body:
examples: The muscle layer needs to be sewn first.
